item.title: Fly tipping, 26th June
item.description:
Fly tipping is a huge problem here this is an alley way with garages we cannot use the garage or get down there there have also been fires and rats have been seen there are mattresses and ever I am so concerned we have just moved here

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 176, Horsa Road, Northumberland Heath, London

item.title: At the back of Kingston house the pathway to get to car park for the 2 bungalows, 26th June
item.description:
The bushes are growing over the pathway and abstracting the walkway to get to car park I also have not got a clear line of view from property to car park because of the bushes on the side of the larger bungalow have not been cut back properly and can the people that come to cut the shrubs and bushes please cut with care thank you and not butcher them which I have been witnessing today.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): The Avenue, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned car Blue Vauxhall Astra DL10HZN, 26th June
item.description:
This car has been abandoned since December 2024 . My previous report ref7753053 dated 24/06/24 and is still parked in Ashbourne Ave 20 metres in from Hythe Avenue, on right hand side of road. Has not been removed as your reply suggests.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ashbourne Avenue, West Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A Bexley Council gree wheelie bin dumped on Footpath 83, 26th June
item.description:
A green Bexley wheelie bin (minus lid) has been dumped in Footpath 83 backing on to my garden. The bin has rubbish in it which will eventually smell and the bin will not be emptied by the council so there will be a bin full of rotting rubbish outside the gardens backing on to this footpath. There is also other rubbish scattered around the footpath. Also, the cannabis smoking smoking continues in this footpath. It should be closed to the public to save the council money in having to continually clear up this rubbish.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rowan Road, Blendon, London
Report on FixMyStreet
